messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Virginia Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: ... I put it on the main Virginia Homeschoolers List plus a new Virginia Unschoolers list that another lady started, oh, and this list. Seemed to work and we
messages.messageBody:
On 15 Dec 02, at 9:42, Kelli Traaseth wrote:

>
> Shyrley,
>
> How did you get the word out to other unschoolers in your area? I
> guess I've thought of the library, but not alot of other ideas.
>
> I'm trying to figure this out,,,,,
>
> Would like to do the same thing here.
>
> Thanks,
> Kelli
>

I put it on the main Virginia Homeschoolers List plus a new Virginia
Unschoolers list that another lady started, oh, and this list.

Seemed to work and we had a great time.

Shyrley


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Virginia Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Shyrley, How did you get the word out to other unschoolers in your area?  I guess I ve thought of the library,  but not alot of other ideas. I m trying to
messages.messageBody:
Shyrley,

How did you get the word out to other unschoolers in your area? I guess I've thought of the library, but not alot of other ideas.

I'm trying to figure this out,,,,,

Would like to do the same thing here.

Thanks,
Kelli

Shyrley <shyrley.williams@...> wrote:
We had our first Unschoolers meeting yesterday and I had a blast.
I think there were 16 kids running around my house playing while
we chatted and laughed.
It was great to meet other Unschoolers here in NoVA as I was
beginning to think everyone was a Pod Person :-)

This will become a regular thing if anyone else wants to come or is
in the area.

Shyrley

"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."
